sentences.sContent: We think of these strategies as having been in response to competition and in response to predation.
sentences.sContent_eng: We think of these strategies as having been in response to competition and in response to predation.
sentences.sCn: 我们认为，它们的这种生存策略是为了应对生存竞争和其他生物的捕食。

sentences.sContent: The fastest land animal in the world, cheetahs once thrived in Africa and Asia, but lion predation haunts their young, and farms and ranching have reduced their habitat.
sentences.sContent_eng: The fastest land animal in the world, cheetahs once thrived in Africa and Asia, but lion predation haunts their young, and farms and ranching have reduced their habitat.
sentences.sCn: 猎豹是陆地上速度最快的动物，曾在亚非大地上大量生长，但它们的幼兽常为狮子等捕食，栖息场所也因不断增加的农庄和牧场而缩减。

words.tran: 掠夺的，掠夺成性的；食肉的；捕食生物的
[动] 捕食者；[动] 食肉动物；掠夺者

trans.tranOther: when an animal kills and eats another animal
